website_summaries.verdict: A lightweight and wallet-friendly cooler that’s perfect for smaller outings.
pros: This durable polypropylene unit holds 41 cans despite weighing less than 8 pounds
It equips a locking and telescoping handle for easy transport, and the soft-side rally wheels are designed to not mark boat surfaces
Covered with a UV inhibitor to mitigate discoloring and overheating
cons: This telescoping handle is relatively flimsy and could fail

customer_reviews.title: Cold for Days
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a boat trip after the zipper on my Yeti broke. The ice stayed in this cooler for 3 days, even on the deck of a boat at the NC coast in July! It has a divider inside that you can freeze to help keep a separate compartment cool, however when the divider froze, it expanded and wouldn't fit into the slot all that well. It's also bulky, but I needed to carry a lot. Overall I am very pleased and recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Huffmadz

customer_reviews.title: Great cooler!  Big but not bulky!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome cooler. Big/deep enough for everything but not too big to handle. Use it almost daily in the summer for the boat. Actually used the pole holders with duct tape on the side of the pontoon boat since they aren't practical on the cooler inside a pontoon boat. Keeps one bag of ice at least 2 days in full 90 degree heat. It can certainly hold 3 or more large bags of ice alone. One bag is good with all the other items we put in it.
customer_reviews.author: Brian A. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Great for what it is
customer_reviews.text: Small size and works great. Wonderful for two people. My only complaints would be that the handles could be a little deeper to give you a better grip when lifting. The lid is also a bit hard to open for the same reason. There is also no drainage hole on this small 28-quart cooler, despite what the reviews suggest.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Merritt

customer_reviews.title: It is a good cooler. It has the ice/cold keeping ability of ...
customer_reviews.text: It is a good cooler. It has the ice/cold keeping ability of most coolers in this price range which is about 2 days under normal conditions. I like the wheels and the handle but what I don't like is the odor. The cooler, when left closed has a very strong chemical order. After airing it out for a few weeks, yes weeks, I am still waiting for the smell to go away.
customer_reviews.author: ECS

customer_reviews.title: Igloo Cooler
customer_reviews.text: Only gave 3 stars because the lid is so hard to open. It usually takes a person to hold it in place so they other person can use both hands to lift the lid. There is not much to hold onto to open the lid. The cooler pulls okay even on rough walkways. It is a good size for two people to take to the pool or a park concert. Just wish it were easier to open.
customer_reviews.author: Busy Flower Lady

customer_reviews.title: So glad we found it!
customer_reviews.text: We got the best deal on this than I’ve ever seen on coolers. We were looking for awhile to replace our drinks camping cooler and the price made us choose this one. We figured, even if it didn’t work out, we could sell in a garage sale or give away. This cooler has worked out perfect. It fits in our limited space and keeps our ice way longer than our old cooler.
customer_reviews.author: Joey's mom

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Nice cooler for the money. Wish the extendable handle were a little more solid. But kept ice for 12 hours despite indirect South Florida heat. EDIT: This thing has not held up well. The back bottom of the handle enclosure is unprotected and has banned from contact with curbs if you try and pull it up and over a curb. I now, after less than six months of ownership, cannot fully retract the handle.
customer_reviews.author: Just a Regular Guy

customer_reviews.title: Tall cooler that fits growlers!
customer_reviews.text: It's nice and tall and fits beer growlers! I had ice last me 13 hours on a road trip from Mpls to Denver. I opened the cooler about 4-5 times at maybe 30 seconds each time. So, I was pleased with the cooler in this aspect. The only complaint is about the design of the handle on the back of the cooler. I had hoped it would work like carry on luggage where you could pull the cooler up stairs using the hard plastic back to slide it up each stair. However, this design has a lip on the back and doesn't allow you to pull it up a stair or over an object smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: Gelly

customer_reviews.title: A good alternative to the YETI, RTIC, etc. Rotomold cooler.
customer_reviews.text: I don't quite think it's going to make it 5 days but it keeps the drinks cold for longer than a day in the heat of the summer and that is what I needed. It is better constructed and sturdier than the basic Igloo. I'm sure a YETI, RTIC, ORCA, etc. would stay cold longer but they cost multiple times what this igloos costs. If you need a good cooler that is well built but aren't ready to spend crazy money on the rotomolds, this is your cooler. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Well made and we are very happy with this cooler
customer_reviews.text: We've had this cooler for a long time (I can't believe we forgot to leave a review earlier because we really like this cooler.) It has held up well and we use it a lot. It is roomy and will keep things cold overnight with ice packs. It rolls easily, even with other things piled on top of it.
customer_reviews.author: Arizona

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Cooler
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a day or more on the boat. I like the telescopic handle. Love the wheels! I agree with the others that it keeps the ice frozen for a long time. I wheeled mine into the garage after a long day on the water, forgot about it, then emptied it a few days later and there was more ice than water inside. The absence of a drain plug is not a big deal to me, as it's not a giant cooler. I would imagine most people could still pick up and/or tip it over if it was completely filled with water. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: TPBayAMZN

customer_reviews.title: Decent Bargain Cooler
customer_reviews.text: Reasonable cheap rolling cooler. Construction is not bad (wouldn't put it through serious abuse). Good stuff for light duty . . .that is, great for shorter trips, etc., would not expect to keep cold over more than a day or two.
customer_reviews.author: B. Barna

customer_reviews.title: Durable and worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect solution for cramped spaces or not wanting to haul a bunch of stuff. Bought specifically for Diner en Blanc (Dinner in White), and it was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: wheels too small
customer_reviews.text: this product is wonderful as far as the body of the ice chest goes, but must return it because you can NOT wheel it up and down steps! The handle mechanism is in the way. It the wheels were larger this would work! The main reason I was buying this was so I don't have to carry the chest up or down steps.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara B.

customer_reviews.title: Wheels fell off after one use.
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this cooler zero stars I would. After one use the wheels fell off. Used it on typical car camping surfaces, asphalt and loose gravel. Wasted $48.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonProductReviewer

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my ice all day in the sun
customer_reviews.text: This cooler is exactly what I was hoping for. I use it on the beach and it keeps my ice all day long. I've had it for about 6 months and the handle is getting a little hard to move up and down but it's my fault for having it in the sand and salt water constantly. The only thing I've found that works as well is 10 times the price. Very happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: Tracyb972

customer_reviews.title: Cool Cooler!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this cooler to use on automobile trips. It advertises that it keeps ice for long periods and it does. On a recent trip to VA and NC we used the cooler off and on for a week to keep our drinks and picnic lunch items cool. It kept ice as advertised and the interior room of the cooler is excellent. The whells and extendable handle are excellent and are of good quality and sound design. My only negative is that I thought the cooler came with a tray to keep sandwiches or other items dry. However, this has proved to be a non-issue. Great product I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: uwaves

customer_reviews.title: G
customer_reviews.text: Great Cooler. Does have a drain plug which I don't like but most do. It hasn't leaked. Very tall so may not be useful for things that you can't stack. Rolls well. Handle is sturdy. Doesn't seem to harm hardwood floors. Wheels too small I would think to roll through sand but works well indoors or on grass or docks. Planned to buy medium size but with prime this is cheaper than medium size. Was concerned areas for attachments would logo cheap but they don't. Keeps things cold. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Winster

customer_reviews.title: Irma-tested, Floridian-approved
customer_reviews.text: Kept ice for 5 days of 95+ degree temps after Hurricane Irma knocked out power out for a week here in Central Florida. This 28 quart size wasn't big enough to save EVERYTHING in the fridge, but it saved enough to keep 2 adult humans fed for 5 days. The side handles are really shallow and terrible - more like fingertip handles! But the wheels and telescoping handle make up for most of that shortcoming. Just pray that you don't have to carry it up any stairs.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Hinkle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size roller cooler
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect size roller cooler for a picnic or a day by the beach. First of all the construction is solid and both the handle and the wheels are very well made. Its quite amazing how effortless it rolls down any terrain. It is small enough to fit in any space it also provide nice sitting alternative when camping. I stopped short of giving it 5 stars because I did not think it kept cold as well most reviewers made it out to be.
customer_reviews.author: PCW127

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, works good
customer_reviews.text: Great! We use these for storing beverages in at events. Keeps product cold & easy to roll. The white looks nicer than the standard blue & red coolers too.
customer_reviews.author: Cortland L Lee

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but good
customer_reviews.text: Great Cooler! When it first arrived I felt the construction was less then average but I've hauled this thing around and it has done surprisingly well. filled with drinks and food and ice it will keep everything cold most all day in direct sun and more then a day if it is in a shady area. My only complaint so far is it's about 1.5 inches to tall to fit in the trunk of my car and when fully loaded it is quite heavy so sticking it in the back seat is difficult do to its size/weight. Otherwise it has been a fantastic cooler so far!
customer_reviews.author: Robert R

customer_reviews.title: Ice on Wheels!
customer_reviews.text: Nice little unit. I like the clean white look, it's sharp. The handle is sturdy and long enough (I'm 6'2" and sometimes that can be an issue). The wheels are sturdy and it rolls nicely. The only thing that prevented a 5 star rating is the ease or lack thereof of opening the lid. It's a little bit of a challenge but not a deal breaker.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Best cooler we've ever had
customer_reviews.text: We took the new cooler to the boat with us and stayed overnight and well through the following afternoon. Water stayed ice cold and the ice packs were still frozen when we put them back into the freezer. This cooler far surpasses our old cooler, which is going straight to Goodwill tomorrow.
customer_reviews.author: Pairofjeans

customer_reviews.title: solid wheels and cooler, handle questionable
customer_reviews.text: Seems solid! We've used it 4 times in the week we've had it and our frozen items have stayed frozen for the few hours they were in there. Wheels seem like they're good quality, too. The only complaint is that the extendable handle seems a little shaky when fully extended. Not sure how long it will last. Love that it's Made in America!
customer_reviews.author: ThisIsUs

customer_reviews.title: Fits most of my needs and performs well
customer_reviews.text: Tis is a very good cooler for my use. Its the right size for most activities. I haven't been disappointed yet with the ice retention. I've had it do well for 2 days in a hot car with some pre-prep. and fine for 2 days on numerous occasions at room temp.
customer_reviews.author: Lee D

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Just received one, and NO WHEELS!!!!! Returning right now, and UNHAPPY.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works for me!
customer_reviews.text: The cooler is well made, handles I have my doubts. Lots of side to side wiggle to them. I bought for evening trips on the boat. It can be hard to open, but to me a tight seal is good. I only use it for 3 hours at a time and so I can't say how it would do all day
customer_reviews.author: Drinnt

customer_reviews.title: best one
customer_reviews.text: best cooler I have ever bought it is small enough for me to lift it fully loaded with drinks and ice yet big enough for me to store lots of drinks keeps everything very cold for most of a day fits easily into my car too - love the wheels and in a pinch I have used it as a seat I would recommend it for sure
customer_reviews.author: Josette Chrystall

customer_reviews.title: but once I put those items in zip lock bags everything fit fine. My only complaint is that it doesn't have ...
customer_reviews.text: When this cooler arrived my first thought was it was smaller than I was expecting. But after packing it I was pleasantly surprised at how much it held. We had 9 water bottles and 6 small Gatorade bottles on the bottom with room on top for other snacks. My tupperware containers didn't fit, but once I put those items in zip lock bags everything fit fine. My only complaint is that it doesn't have a drain.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Love this cooler. Bought it to take to kids functions and works great to hold drinks and lunch for a whole group of people. Wheels work well. Even took it in the sand on the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Shaebo

customer_reviews.title: So cute and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the wheels and the size. Nice tight closure! And kept my drinks nice and cold. And did I mention the wheels?!
customer_reviews.author: MartyG

customer_reviews.title: Nice cooler for the price
customer_reviews.text: Nice cooler for the price. It is not a yeti, but doesn't have the cost either. The rod holders are nice, but the cup holders could be a little stronger attachment. I would purchase again. Thinking about turning it into a speaker cooler with the Pyle waterproof speaker amp kit: Pyle PLMRKT2A 2-Channel Waterproof MP3/iPod Amplified 6.5-Inch Marine Speaker System
customer_reviews.author: Stan M.

customer_reviews.title: Totally useless to me
customer_reviews.text: Close impossible to open. There is a very tiny grip and the lid closes very tight. I had to use a screw driver. Totally useless to me.
customer_reviews.author: Penelope

customer_reviews.title: Igloo Ultra Roller Cooler
customer_reviews.text: We needed a smaller yet portable cooler for our car, for hauling perishable grocery items. This one is perfect. Groceries are easily moved from the car to the kitchen. The large, space saving cooling block is a great help, Simply pop it into the freezer until you need it. After years of searching for just the right cooler, we found it with this Igloo Roller Cooler. Of course the cooler has multiple uses, but we sure our pleased with ours being a grocery saver! Now, if we have other stops before getting groceries home we don't have to worry about any spoilage! Good investment!
customer_reviews.author: Susie L

customer_reviews.title: Great road trip cooler.
customer_reviews.text: This cooler does a good job of keeping ice and is big enough to hold just about everything we need for two night weekend trips. While the drain plug is in a functional location, it is not readily visible and could be left open by mistake. The long handle and big wheels make it a breeze to wheel into hotels and up to our room.
customer_reviews.author: Beezer

customer_reviews.title: Great cooler, needs a drain
customer_reviews.text: Looked around for the right size/style cooler to ride on the front plate of our motorcycle trailer. Found it right here. Keeps ice frozen well. 4 stars because they didn't include a drain in this. I purchased an aftermarket drain at a sporting goods store and drilled this cooler out to accomodate it. Now it's ideal.
customer_reviews.author: Prime addict :)

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Keeps everything cold (with the help of blue ice) for at least 24 hours. Have had it in the truck of my car in hot weather and still have cold drinks.
customer_reviews.author: MAMohr

customer_reviews.title: Does a great job keeping things cold
customer_reviews.text: I mainly use this cooler for my fishing outings. I love that it's small enough to fit in the trunk of my small car (Scion Tc 07) but still large enough to hold most of my catches (anything up to 2 ft long). The ice bags stay frozen despite being out in the sun for long days, and the wheels and extendable handle make the cooler easy to transport. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Joe M.

customer_reviews.title: Great cooler. Love the amount of insulation
customer_reviews.text: Great cooler. Love the amount of insulation, the width (fits much better than wider ones going through doors) and why would you buy one without wheels? I didn't receive the rod holders or the drink holders that were in the description, though. Not a big deal as I still love this cooler.
customer_reviews.author: 5001craig

customer_reviews.title: Love the color and fits a ton for a picnic!
customer_reviews.text: Used this for Diner en Blanc and was able to fit all decorations including my food and cutlery. Love the color and wheels are a savior!
customer_reviews.author: Brigitte P.

customer_reviews.title: Looking for cooler for your White Party, this is it!
customer_reviews.text: This was great for my White Party- Diner En Blanc, highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: MissDecember

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This cooler seems expensive compared to what is available in local big box stores. However, we're always happy to pay more for better quality, and the Igloo Marine Breeze seems very well made. Food stays cold for a reasonable length of time. Most of all, I love the "wheeled" feature so that my husband no longer has to carry our old cooler with no wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty

customer_reviews.title: Took this to Catalina island and was very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Took this to Catalina island and was very happy with it. Easy to roll, keeps things cold, and saved us money on drinks while we were there.
customer_reviews.author: KevinK

customer_reviews.title: OUTSTANDING PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I looked for a cooler to use on our boat that wasnt huge but would hold enough ice and drinks. This cooler fit the bill. It also has drink holders and rod holders. That makes it even better. No retail store had it and what they did have was way to large or way to small.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: It is a great size and fits everything that we need
customer_reviews.text: It is a great size and fits everything that we need. The wheels placed toward the outside edges make it sturdy when rolling. It would be better if you could fit 3 cans across the bottom width, and the lid is VERY hard to open. When you are in and out of the cooler because of kids, it makes it a bit difficult.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very decent product
customer_reviews.text: The cooler arrived with plastic hinge parts broken, so that was less than ideal. It keeps things cool, but not as well as I had thought it would.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this cooler
customer_reviews.text: I love this cooler! if it had cup holders it would have been out of this world awesome, but it kept my food cold for three days so I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: Angeline Tran

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Took this to the beach and it was just what we needed and the handle still works!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Barkse

customer_reviews.title: I've had the non-marine model and loved it until I broke the handle using it as ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had the non-marine model and loved it until I broke the handle using it as a backrest (do not do this). This one is a little better than the other version as the marine plastic will hold ice better and the wheels are gripped. This is for everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: digisaurusrex

customer_reviews.title: Works well, easy to manage
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to manage. Can hold about a case with little ice. or hold half a case with lots of ice.
customer_reviews.author: Tim M.

customer_reviews.title: Good Cooler
customer_reviews.text: The cooler holds ice well, and the divider serves both that function and is a refreezable ice bottle to help cool the ice chest. The top is labeled "Do Not Sit".
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Loved it.
customer_reviews.text: Hubby had surgery. Needed an ice chest i could handle. Loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Deblee

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Very secure closure, almost too tight actually, you really have to pry to with your fingers to open it. But I guess that keeps everything colder longer which is what I want. Also I didn't check the dimensions closely enough, it is a little smaller than I thought but I still use it all of the time. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: mm2

customer_reviews.title: I ordered this cooler to take to the lake. ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this cooler to take to the lake. The only thing is that I wish the wheel were a little big bigger to maneuver curbs. I did order a basket on Amazon to go inside the cooler.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia V.

customer_reviews.title: Good item
customer_reviews.text: Took 2 tries, the first one arrived broken but the second try arrived perfect and it works really good on my boat and under the sun. Wish the lid didn't come off so easily. Room for improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto Morales

customer_reviews.title: Should have cost less.
customer_reviews.text: Wasn’t as big as I thought for the price. I paid 40 bucks and it should have been $20 for the size. Couldn’t get much in it.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda Bright

customer_reviews.title: Drain leaks.
customer_reviews.text: Great cooler and perfect size. Keeps ice average time. Would give it 4-5 stars but the drain leaks. This makes the cooler strictly an outdoor cooler. I may have a faulty drain, but nothing I do to adjust it stops the , albeit a very slow but still a leak.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Higuchi

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to handle and extremely difficult to open
customer_reviews.text: This is really a lot of work to open Too hard. And not easy to handle except on wheels or flat surface. A real pain and not worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Great cooler!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cooler! Can keep things cold for 2 days. I have 2 of them and may purchase another!
customer_reviews.author: sherry

customer_reviews.title: ... This thing is not only top quality but quite nice, large & spacious
customer_reviews.text: Wow - This thing is not only top quality but quite nice, large & spacious. I am very happy about the added items; Large Ice Pack that fits in the middle + top rack. Very nice. VERY VERY Happy.
customer_reviews.author: HaRebecca

customer_reviews.title: our best cooler so far!
customer_reviews.text: great Cooler. I got this for my Husband and it really holds ice well and it's very easy for me to wheel around once he loads it up!
customer_reviews.author: KTurn

customer_reviews.title: as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Much better than the original cube coolers, this is one is a bit wider and not as deep. great product for chilling drinks and brining turkeys & pork for the smoker!
customer_reviews.author: Norm

customer_reviews.title: All white is the way to go!
customer_reviews.text: Hate all the coolers out there that are super bright and ugly, love this all white design and the gray wheels. So far, this has worked great and kept drinks cool! No regrets.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Igloo Marine Cooler
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to transport! Keeps ice for a long time. Has very good capacity. Can hold several large bottles of soda upright.
customer_reviews.author: UAB

customer_reviews.title: Strong and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This cooler will be very easy to use while traveling. It's big enough to hold food and drinks and has a separate compartment so things aren't floating around in the ice. It's sturdy and easy to maneuver.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Use it alot. Can put the chairs on top of cooler and "roll along".
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little cooler
customer_reviews.text: This cooler is perfect for the backseat floor board of my truck. It holds a good amount of beverages, keeps them cold and holds ice very well. The wheels and handle are very sturdy. Would recommend this product highly!
customer_reviews.author: txwildfire

customer_reviews.title: good cooler but for the price diff I would get ...
customer_reviews.text: good cooler but for the price diff I would get the non marine one next time. The price difference doesn't equate to a quality difference.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch

customer_reviews.title: Great cooler!
customer_reviews.text: This contraption is awesome! It holds so much and keeps everything cold. But, its footprint isn't as huge as most coolers. Pulling it along, even though it may be full, is very easy. My only qualm is that it doesn't have one of those drain hole things for melted ice. But, I knew it didn't when I bought it. I did not know I would miss that. Still, overall, it is a great cooler, and I do not regret my purchase. When I took it with me on a weekend trip, my friends wanted to use it too, and we were all able to keep our food cold inside.
customer_reviews.author: R. N. Kinnison

customer_reviews.title: great price will work perfect on the boat or
customer_reviews.text: Well made, great price will work perfect on the boat or anywhere
customer_reviews.author: Paul B

customer_reviews.title: Size
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect size to wheel into tournaments. Not too big.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra L. Vesey

customer_reviews.title: Nice Cooler
customer_reviews.text: I needed a smaller cooler for three days of camping. Still had ice after three days in 80 plus weather. I did keep the cooler in the shade, which helped.
customer_reviews.author: Cowgirl At Heart

customer_reviews.title: Nice but dangerous  :-)
customer_reviews.text: Only compliant is that it is really tough to get the lid up. I certainly wanted it to be tight but I have broken fingernails trying to pry it off.
customer_reviews.author: P. Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Easy portability
customer_reviews.text: A rolling libation storage and cooling container. What is not to like.
customer_reviews.author: P. Watase

customer_reviews.title: Best cooler ever!
customer_reviews.text: SOooo glad I bought this! Perfect size, sturdy stable wheels, clean white design. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: DeborahDarlingTop Contributor: Knitting

customer_reviews.title: Stays cold all day
customer_reviews.text: I love this cooler, it stays super cold all day even out in the heat. We go to baseball tournaments almost every weekend and this cooler is big enough for drinks and snacks for all day without being too huge to manage.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: This insulates very well, and I'm happy that I purchased one with wheels. My only a little complaint is it would be even better if there was a drain.
customer_reviews.author: tk

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT.
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT... keeps everything nice and cold for ages!! ice packs and frozen breast milk survived 18 hours in transit without the slightest bit of defrosting...
customer_reviews.author: belbel

customer_reviews.title: Great Cooler
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this before a vacation. Took it with us on the boat in 90 degree+ teperatures. Put a frozen ice pack on the bottom, added our sandwiches, Diet Cokes and water and put another ice pack on top of the bottles/cans. Choc Chip cookies and grapes on top of that. Stayed ice cold for the 8+ hours we were out. Great Cooler ---5-stars from us. Al- Iowa (My wife didn't think we needed a new cooler, but after 1 day on the boat she said it was great!) Bought it off Amazon, very fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Vande Weerd

customer_reviews.title: Love this cooler.
customer_reviews.text: Love this cooler. Just the right size and made in the USA.
customer_reviews.author: Hunt&FishVA

customer_reviews.title: Great cooler
customer_reviews.text: Great cooler. Rolls easy and keeps items cold for long time.
customer_reviews.author: Robert  L. Wareham

customer_reviews.title: Great. Marine Cooler
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product! Ended up returning it as it was bigger than we wanted. Has fishing pole holders, beverage cup holders.
customer_reviews.author: TrishScott

customer_reviews.title: Good Value  for the Money
customer_reviews.text: Good solid cooler - keeps ice solid for 24+ hours, wheels are a little small
customer_reviews.author: Dennis F.

customer_reviews.title: pockets are not deep enough to carry comfortably. Positive
customer_reviews.text: After one summer of use, one of the wheels wore out at the axle. Molded handle grips are also poorly designed, pockets are not deep enough to carry comfortably. Positive: it holds a lot!
customer_reviews.author: skrampj

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: Nice size cooler. Not to big and not to small
customer_reviews.author: darren rabb

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase, happy camper
customer_reviews.text: My dog is an avid camper. He packs his treats, fruit and water in the cooler which stay cold the entire day!
customer_reviews.author: Valsoy

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome...Just the right size. Convenient handle for transportation of food/beverages.
customer_reviews.author: MadamLibrarian

customer_reviews.title: Keeps Items Cold
customer_reviews.text: Really keeps refrigerated items cold on the 2 hour trip back from the grocery store.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy H. Geraci

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: well made and the pole holders and cup holders come in handy.
customer_reviews.author: J Sellers

customer_reviews.title: MEETS OUR NEEDS
customer_reviews.text: Nice mid size. Like the wheels. So far the handle is holding up. Could use larger side handles for lifting.
customer_reviews.author: Dreamweaver

customer_reviews.title: cooler
customer_reviews.text: works good for the price. good for day travel and beach
customer_reviews.author: RONALD CARROLL

customer_reviews.title: Great size. Has a neat tray that goes inside ...
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves it. Great size. Has a neat tray that goes inside and a fillable freeze pack divider

customer_reviews.title: Like the smaller but deeper size
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use in my boat. Like the smaller but deeper size
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size cooler to load up with drinks and go boating. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Great size, but doesn't keep the ice for long ...
customer_reviews.text: Great size, but doesn't keep the ice for long as i hoped it would. Few hours drive and everything was melted.
customer_reviews.author: Koki

customer_reviews.title: Great cooler!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!! Not too big or too small. Perfect! Great price too!
customer_reviews.author: Thao

customer_reviews.title: Great Cooler
customer_reviews.text: Works great and I have no complaints . You get exactly for what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: amylynnjohnson

customer_reviews.title: It rolls
customer_reviews.text: I wish it had a handle to left or carry. Where you can roll
customer_reviews.author: Alfred Bernard

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Have used this as a check in bag on two trips to SW states and it survived the plane ride and functioned well as a cooler in the desert.
customer_reviews.author: RTWRTW

product_meta.title: Igloo Marine Breeze Roller Cooler
feature_bullets: Push button and locking telescoping handle for easy transport
Non-marking translucent soft-side sport rally wheels won't mark boat surfaces
Cool Riser Technology design improves cooling performance
Molded side scoop handles for ease of loading and unloading
